name: Warrior (itch) (Dongsheng Sun)
description:
A level-breaking and decrypting game based on the daily tasks of firefighters.

Movement keys are WASD

The interaction key is E (get on the car, switch, etc.)

Please complete the task within 10 seconds, click the enlarge button (If you can't find the zoom, it's in the screenshots of the game) in the lower right corner to start the game in full screen.
